scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix microservices/ts-auth-service-1625 && npm install --prefix microservices/ts-tms-service-1666 && npm install --prefix microservices/ts-notification-service-1677
scripts.start: concurrently "npm start --prefix microservices/ts-auth-service-1625" "npm start --prefix microservices/ts-tms-service-1666" "npm start --prefix microservices/ts-notification-service-1677"
